backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing contact forms and courses with add, fetch, and sorted list queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping hero image fixes and asset-path verification to HomePage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, pages, hooks, and configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark modes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with metadata, favicon, and root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and four main routes.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout with header navigation, responsive mobile menu, branding, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching backend actor instances tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity auth client, login flow, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching courses, submitting contact forms, and retrieving form data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and brand colors, plus utility classes for brand color styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays an About page with hero content and cards describing the organization's vision and mission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with form handling, contact details, and form submission via a query hook with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Shows course offerings as styled cards with details and an enroll button navigating to the contact page.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for faculty information.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero content, program highlights, and call‑to‑action buttons for enrollment and contact.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for results content.
frontend/src/pages/WhyChooseUsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for reasons to choose the organization.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors from CSS variables, extended theming, plugins, and component styling options.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for fixing a hero image visibility issue, including known issues and existing feature tasks. Contains metadata, image requirements, and no new feature requests.
